fundingsOnboardingModal.headerTooltip: This tool is only for New Jersey-based businesses. Others can explore NJEDA funding on [Business.NJ.gov](https://business.nj.gov/funding).

nonProfitQuestion.selectAnAnswerText: Select if your New Jersey business is a nonprofit.

numberOfEmployeesQuestion.questionText: How many full-time employees does your business have?
numberOfEmployeesQuestion.selectAnAnswerText: Enter your current number of full-time employees.

pageHeader.subHeaderText: Discover funding programs your business may be eligible for. To see more personalized funding and business resources, create a Business.NJ.gov account.
